document.full_text: thomas voeckler of france won the 118-mile fourth stage of the paris-nice race after an early breakaway, beating three riders in a sprint finish.
document.title: sports briefing | cycling: belgian reclaims paris-nice lead
lines_and_colors: thomas voeckler of france won the 118-mile fourth stage of the paris-nice race after an early breakaway, beating three riders in a sprint finish.
